channel.description: Implementing a Vending Machine In the third programming assignment, weâ€™re going to build a simple finite state machine program that represents a real-life vending machine. This is a great way to practice both loops and conditional statements in our code. Learning Objectives The goal of this assignment is to demonstrate understanding of the following topics in Python: Boolean Logic Conditional Statements Loops Nested Loops & Conditional Statements Loops for Input Finite State Machine in Code A finite state machine is a simple representation of a real-world system that has a defined set of states and transitions between those states.
